Name: Cannabis
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring, summer, or fall. Takes 12 days to mature, afterwards it continues to produce every 4 days.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalos en la primavera, verano o otoño. Tarda 12 días en madurar, continúa produciendo cada 4 días.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄, 여름이나 가을에 심으세요. 성숙 기간은 12일이며, 그 후 생산은 4일마다 계속된다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen Sie diese im Frühjahr, Sommer oder Herbst. Die Reifezeit beträgt 12 Tage. Danach wird die Produktion alle 4 Tage fortgesetzt.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera, verão ou outono. Leva 12 dias para amadurecer e continua produzindo a cada 4 dias.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天、夏天或秋天播种。12天成熟。之后每4天收获一次。
